data.actual_result: Transferring ownership button stays and you are allowed to click on it multiple times even though it does nothing until you click “close”
data.short_description: Ability to transfer ownership multiple times even tho the button does nothing after transferring the first time. (So far on iPad 2nd generation only) + 2FA Enabled on your main
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a fresh server with your main (iPhone)- Let your alt join (iPad)- Transfer ownership to your alt (should work as it prompts u to fill in a code) (iPhone)- Transfer ownership back to your main (your alt is required not to have 2FA) (iPad)
